clinical_study.brief_title: Motivators and Barriers to Physical Activity in Knee Osteoarthritis Patients: a Qualitative Study
clinical_study.official_title: Motivators and Barriers to Physical Activity in Knee Osteoarthritis Patients: a Qualitative Study

brief_summary.textblock: This study sought to better identify the motivators and barriers to osteoarthritic patients practising regular physical activity. This is a crucial step towards enabling each health professional to adapt their therapy recommendations, while taking into account the patient's overall lifestyle.

detailed_description.textblock: The qualitative research design is well-suited to this type of issue. This choice was justified by need to investigate and understand the actions from the participants' point of view. This exploratory method, conducted in the form of individual interviews and focus groups, enabled us to document the personal experiences, practices, and personal history of each individual
